ModMetaData.name: Soul & Serpent
ModMetaData.author: ValandorShadowbyte
ModMetaData.description:
Soul & Serpent adds two powerful and forbidden psycast paths to RimWorld:
Soulweaver: Masters of consciousness transfer who can possess enemies, swap bodies with allies, and achieve immortality through continuous soul transfer. These dark practitioners are feared for their ability to never truly die, always finding a new host when their current vessel fails them.
Snakesage: Practitioners of serpentine psycasts who channel the primal power of snakes. They can summon deadly vipers, shed their skin to heal grievous wounds, and strike with the speed and precision of a cobra. These masters of the forbidden snake arts are feared for their regenerative abilities and mastery of venomous attacks.
